action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

Hope you are doing well.

While creating Google tags I noticed a couple of things on the website, could you please help me fix them.

1. The forms are not working. If I am logged in on WP then it works but if I am not then the forms don't submit. Can you please have a look and fix.

2. The phone numbers are showing a %20 to fill up the space, so when the reports come in it gets very difficult to read the number in the label. See screenshot below. Could you please fix these on all phone numbers..



Please let me know once done

Thanks & Regards

Pankaj
